title: Burglars conduct ‘puja’ in Kerala finance firm before looting gold, cash - Onmanorama
content: Burglars conduct ‘puja’ in Kerala finance firm before looting gold, cash  Onmanorama
description: The burglars looted gold worth Rs 30 lakh and cash amounting to Rs 4 lakh. A poster was pasted on the wall, which said in English: 'I am dangerous; don’t follow me.'
